pageContext.claim: “We have some very big news on TikTok. TikTok is moving along. We're dealing with Oracle, which you know of. Larry Ellison. And we're dealing with, as a combination, Walmart -- Walmart, a great company. A great American company. The security will be 100 percent. They'll be using separate clouds and a lot of very, very powerful security. And they'll be making about a 5-billion-dollar contribution toward education. We're going to be setting up a very large fund toward the education of American youth. And that'll be great. That's their contribution that I've been asking for.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump repeatedly said he would make sure the Treasury Department received a "very big" payment as a condition of approving any deal involving the sale of TikTok or its assets to an American tech company, He later admitted that he was told by U.S. government lawyers that seeking such a payment was against the law.
